entry.tran: 不科学的；无科学知识的
entry.def: Research or treatment that is unscientific is not likely to be good because it is not based on facts or is not done in the proper way.

example.ex: No member of the team was medically qualified and its methods were considered totally unscientific.
example.tran: 这支队伍中的成员没有一个具有行医资格，而且他们使用的方法也被认为根本不科学。
这样一个数目很小且不具科学性的投票者样本
